verses.name: Jeremiah 52:12
verses.text: Now in the fifth month, in the tenth day of the month, which was the nineteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, came Nebuzar–adan, captain of the guard, which served the king of Babylon, into Jerusalem,

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:13
verses.text: And burned the house of the Lord, and the king’s house; and all the houses of Jerusalem, and all the houses of the great men, burned he with fire:

verses.name: Jeremiah 52:14
verses.text: And all the army of the Chaldeans, that were with the captain of the guard, brake down all the walls of Jerusalem round about.
